attributes.action: Remove tax on energy saving light bulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is all very well asking people to change to energy saving lightbulbs. Why don't the government actually give people an incentive to change by removing the tax on energy saving lightbulbs. Some people cannot afford in the short term to buy these products, if they were cheaper then people would be more likely to buy and use them.
